title: Used Apps Netflix
text: You must have used apps Netflix, Spotify, Twitter, Uber, Ola. You must have seen that these apps work flawlessly even when millions of people around the earth are clicking the same buttons at the same time. Have you wondered why? happens because of cloud and cloud native cloud is basically an external server on which you host your app cloud native is also an external server but it comes with micro services to learn more about cloud and cloud native the Department of Electronics Electronics and Computer Engineering presents you a course on the same. This is a 50 hour course and it is certified.
summary: cloud and cloud native cloud is basically an external server on which you host your app cloud native . it comes with micro services to learn more about cloud native the department of Electronics Electronics and Computer Engineering presents you a course on the same .
